cast.name: 史蒂夫·恩格尔哈特 Steve Englehart

this_title: Sentinel of the Spaceways: Comic Book Origins of the Silver Surfer
trans_title: 太空哨兵：银影侠的漫画起源
introduction: In this documentary we hear from FF creator Stan Lee, writer/artist Jim Starlin, and writers Ron Marz, Steve Englehart, and JM DeMatteis as they examine the beginnings of the Surfer in the comics and follows his development over the years. It also discusses the various folks who worked on the Surfer through time and how he changed. It offers a very nice primer about the Surfer. It gives us a broad view of the character over time and discusses him in a compelling way.
chinese_title: 太空哨兵：银影侠的漫画起源
foreign_title: Sentinel of the Spaceways: Comic Book Origins of the Silver Surfer
